author: ozeigermann
msg: Fixed problem with locks in tx file store:
- Date format has been changed in order to save dates having years later than 2070.
Previous to this fix 2072 has been stored as 72 and interpreted as 1972 which made fresh locks

author: ozeigermann
msg: Fixed problem with locks in tx file store:
- Date format has been changed in order to save dates having years later than 2070.
Previous to this fix 2072 has been stored as 72 and interpreted as 1972 which made fresh locks

author: ozeigermann
msg: - Fixed problem with failed commits as read locks were unnecessarily upgraded to commit locks

author: ozeigermann
msg: - Fixed problem with failed commits as read locks were unnecessarily upgraded to commit locks
